rule: The response must not include any introductory text, explanations, or extraneous information not specified in the desired format.
input: Text: Google's project on self-driving cars has reached a milestone, according to spokesperson Kevin Yang.
validityText:

The text is complete enough to contain relevant entities and provides information in a human-readable format and in an understandable language. It does not appear to violate any rules set by the input specification. Therefore, the input complies with the input specification.

OK
